tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: What...? No, how could I lose??

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Easy. You messed with the wrong Ruicosa.

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: No... NO! I don't accept this! You cheated! You and your shapeshifting!

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Or, maybe you picked a bad fight. Maybe you're not as strong as you think you are.

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: This is not over. The Royal Guard and I will take you down!

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Well, sounds like you'll have your work cut out for you then.
